headline: PARTICLE MEASURING SYSTEMS DI WATER PARTICLE COUNTER
specstable:
Manufacturer Particle Meas Sys
Model HSLI M50E
Maximum Number of Channels 1
Light Source Laser Diode
Other Information

Size range: 0.05-0.2 um
Channel: one
Channel sizes: 0.05,0.1,0.15,0.2 um
Optimum flow rate: 100+-10% mL/min.
Sample volume:0.25 mL/min.
Counting efficiency: 100% of the sample volume
Sample compatibility: DI water
Maximum concentration: 10,000 counts/mL
Sample temperature: 10-90 Deg C
Zero count level: 1000 counts/liter
Communications: Ethernet/RS232

Power Requirements 120/220 V 0.3 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 9.000 in (22.9 cm)
Height 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Weight 34 lb (15 kg)
